rationale: Toast notifications only have an entrance animation (toast-in). When dismissed, they instantly disappear which is jarring. Users also have no indication of how long the toast will remain visible, leading to anxiety about missing important messages.
problemSolved: Toast.jsx has animate-toast-in animation (lines 109-121) but no exit animation. ToastItem component (line 34-61) renders immediately and disappears instantly when removed from toasts array. No visual indication of auto-dismiss duration (default 4000ms).
